name: The 11 Games For 11 Months Project!
description:
"Have you ever had a story in your head and you just wanted to see how it would look in a game?"

In 2021,  I wanted to get back into working on consistent projects. I had done smaller projects, but had lacked the motivation to work on any big game project. I often make games with simplistic stories, but sometimes go in over my head when making the game. Then, one night in January I realized something: What if I did a bunch of small projects, stories I constantly made in my head, and put them together? 

Thus, this silly, somewhat unoriginal, tiring project began. Starting on February 2021, I had from the beginning of the month till 11:59 PM before the next month to finish the project I was working on.  And then do the same thing from March all the way to December.  Now that its 2022, I want to share this project. I do want to say this though:

  • All of these games are bad.
  • Some of these games have bugs I couldn't finish in time.
  • Some of these games have their own original stories (more content than others).
  • Some of these games are extremely short.
  • But no matter what, I love all of them through the hard times and good times making them.
  • What's in these games shows all of those story ideas I have in my head, ones I know I may never have time to fully develop in the time we have now. 
  • This project is special to me. So I hope that you enjoy them all.

I plan to release the games as I go into the rest of 2022. I will continually update the page with each new game. The first 3 games (February, March and April) will be available, while (May, June, July) will be available later on (and so on and so forth). Release status is "In development" but the content is fully complete, and will be changed once all the games are completed.

All credit and content warnings will be given for each game unless otherwise stated.

PROJECT(S) Synopsis:

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1. February: 

Two old childhood friends awkward teenagers meet each other after school after being a part of a few years and find out they are interested in one another. They start to date but begin to question whether or not they are truly being interesting and worried about being “plain and basic” with their relationship. At the same time, some weird bizarre stuff starts happening. Mainly during their first date.
This project is a simple excerpt of what it would be.

Main tag: Romance, action

2. March: 

A group of adventurers take refuge at a Inn after being attacked by the Dark Disciples, an enemy they are facing. However, Clara believes that something is suspicious about the Inn, and decides to investigate. Investigate the Inn with the D20. Let's hope you roll high and succeed in what you find...

Main tag: RPG, Turn based Combat, DND

3. April: 

A few students are camping outside. They decide to play with urban legend that says if you mess around with it, a skeleton will appear and tear your skin off. After doing a small game, they go to sleep and wake up in a random building, being told to play a "game..."

Main tag: Visual novel, dark, mystery, puzzle

Warnings: Manipulation and mentions of "removing skin"
